nodes.text: Magsol or Magnetic Solution, was a solution composed of magnetic particles that was used by the Ssi-ruuk during the process of entechment. The solution was injected into a Human's body with the result being that the brain would become attuned to the Entechment rig. Once the magsol was energized by an external magnetic field, the subject's life force was forced out of the body for storage.
